entry.title: make believe
entry.summary:
Author: seligenacht

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,723Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 26

Summary: “Kent!” Clark says, too loudly. “Clark Kent, sir. That’s…that’s my name.” Mr. Wayne just nods. At this point, Clark thinks direct kryptonite exposure would be less painful than this. Before he can embarrass himself further, he reaches into his worn leather satchel and produces a tape recorder. He clicks the record button and sets it on the table between them.Clark Kent has an interview with Bruce Wayne. It goes about as well as expected.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,228Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 171

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: The Trinity Reforged
entry.summary:
Author: Unctrlablyalt (tay_tay19)

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,380Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: What if the Trinity swapped places?Bruce Wayne, former boy detective of Smallville, Kansas, has left home for the first time ready to explore the world outside the small town where he'd and his family had sought refuge after fleeing from Gotham. Determined to figure out who he is outside the safety of his small town upbringing with three loving parents.Diana Prince of Gotham, raised in the lap of luxury as the only heir of the Prince Enterprises dynasty. Diana has never wanted for anything but her parents sudden death leads to the discovery of decades of wrong doing. Determined to make up for her parents sins Diana travels the world training under masters of all types in order to make her return to Gotham.Charilaos, the last son of Krypton. When his ship crash lands on the shores of Themyscira the Amazon's declared his arrival a gift from the gods and despite centuries of tradition he was allowed to remain and grow on the island among the warriors. Upon discovering the truth of his arrival on earth he takes up his birth name of Kal-El and leaves the island behind to explore the world of men for the first time.

entry.title: the door's about to open (i'm about to fall for you)
entry.summary:
Author: brucewaynessluttyboots (missakwatson)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,266Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 210

Summary: “What day are you heading home for Thanksgiving?” As Clark clicked through his calendar, he tallied the days left until he could start the long drive back to Smallville. “I—” Bruce glanced at his own screen. “I’m staying here.” “You’re—here?” Bruce just nodded, and Clark realized a second too late that holidays might not be a benign topic after all. He’d assumed Bruce had someone—grandparents, cousins, even family friends—to spend his breaks with. But now that Clark thought about it, hadn’t he mentioned staying in Metropolis over the summer, too? “Come back with me, then.” *** Or: Clark Kent succumbs to the overwhelming urge to invite his new friend Bruce Wayne to join him for his family's Thanksgiving. Clark is in law school, Bruce is a reluctant MBA student, and there's no way either of them is getting out of this without a giant, slightly inconvenient crush.

entry.title: Gods Don't Belong in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 90,447Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 947

Summary: “Well?” he asked, his voice low.A pause.His eyes dragged over Clark, not with drunken lust but with something sharper.“You here to watch… or join? Might as well make it a threesome.”Clark choked on his own spit so hard he nearly doubled over, coughing. It's been 5 years since both Superman and Batman began their separate crusades. Both curious but cautious.Clark remains in Metropolis, respecting the Dark Knight's strict rule to keep metas out of Gotham. Meanwhile, Bruce is consumed with finding a balance between Batman and Bruce Wayne, determine to not repeat mistakes of the past. But it's hard to do that when he is too stubborn to accept help. Fortunately, for him Clark is just as stubborn.Their paths cross when Clark is sent to cover a gala in Gotham, stepping into the city he's barred from. What begins as a professional obligation turns into an unforgettable collision with Gotham's once reclusive billionaire. Or Clark and Bruce fall for each other slowly yet quickly.
